meanings.definition: Animals that live on the surface of the sea floor or on the surface of other underwater structures.
meanings.sent1: The epifaunae on the sea floor include crabs and starfish.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the diversity of epifaunae in different ocean regions.
meanings.sent3: The playful epifaunae had a race on the sandy ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: The colorful epifaunae painted a vibrant picture on the sea bed.
meanings.sent5: The tiny epifaunae scurried around, creating a bustling underwater city.

meanings.definition: The community of organisms that live on the surface of the ocean floor.
meanings.sent1: Divers observed the bustling epifaunae community during their expedition.
meanings.sent2: The epifaunae community plays a crucial role in the ocean ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous epifaunae community organized a talent show on the seabed.
meanings.sent4: The epifaunae community resembled a colorful mosaic on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent5: The diverse epifaunae community thrived in their underwater neighborhood.
